LanguageData.Chocomilk.label: 巧克力牛奶
LanguageData.Caramel.label: 焦糖
LanguageData.Caramel.description: A sweet candy made from sugar。
LanguageData.Chocolate.label: Chocolate
LanguageData.Chocolate.description: A delicious preparation of cocoa seeds ground together with sugar and vanilla. Very pleasurable to eat, but not very nutritious。
